thread.title: Top247 LB gives Vols final signing-day addition
thread.title_full: Top247 LB gives Vols final signing-day addition

title: Top247 LB gives Vols final signing-day addition
text: Manage Top247 LB gives Vols final signing-day addition Top247 linebacker Will Ignont of New Market, Ala., signed with Tennessee on Wednesday, giving the Vols their final expected addition on National Signing Day. Slot to Tennessee Links Top247 senior linebacker Will Ignont of Buckhorn High School in New Market, Ala., signed with Tennessee on Wednesday, giving the Vols their final expected addition on National Signing Day. The 6-foot-2, 230-pound Ignont had been committed to Tennessee since late October. He chose the Vols over LSU and UCLA, and he called off a planned visit to LSU in January and shut down his recruitment for the final weeks leading up to signing day. (What's next for the Vols? Make sure you're in the loop — take five seconds to sign up for our FREE Vols newsletter now!) Ignont is ranked by 247Sports as the nation’s No. 114 overall prospect and No. 5 inside linebacker in the 2017 class. In the industry-generated 247Sports Composite, he’s ranked the nation’s No. 307 overall player and No. 16 inside linebacker. BUY ONE MONTH, GET TWO MONTHS FREE to get VIP access to GoVols247. Author
